title: Dogzilla
description: Dogzilla is a funny picture book from the genius mind of Dav Pilkeyâ€”creator of laugh-out-loud kid favorites including Captain Underpants and Dog Man. It's time for Mousopolis's First Annual Barbecue Cook-Off. But just when the fun is about to begin, the irresistible aroma of barbecue sauce awakens the most frightening creature known to the dreaded Dogzilla! As her horrible doggy breath fills the streets, the residents of Mousopolis must run for their lives. Can they get rid of that big stinky dog before it's too late? For kids not quite ready to enter the chapter book world, Dogzilla is a winner.
author: Dav Pilkey
